articles.title: Yeovil Town 2-0 Southend United - BBC
articles.description: Two early goals are enough for Yeovil to see off Southend 2-0 in the National League.
articles.content:
Yeovil hit two early goals to beat Southend 2-0 and move above United into 12th in the National League table.
